flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: The typical equipment for this game is four wooden sticks, racers, and the game board. This version of the game is made of paper. There are paper templates in the attached documents.
guide.introduction_rendered: The typical equipment for this game is four wooden sticks, racers, and the game board. This version of the game is made of paper. There are paper templates in the attached documents.

lines.text: Print the PDF files PrintVersionYutBoard.pdf and PrintVersionInside.pdf. (Or, if possible, you can print YutGameBoard.pdf instead. It's 36cmX36cm size. But it's not for a kit version.)
lines.text_raw: Print the PDF files '''PrintVersionYutBoard.pdf''' and '''PrintVersionInside.pdf'''. (Or, if possible, you can print '''YutGameBoard.pdf''' instead. It's 36cmX36cm size. But it's not for a kit version.)

lines.text: Cut out each part.
lines.text_raw: Cut out each part.

lines.text: I prefer printing on slightly stiff paper or card stock instead of regular paper.
lines.text_raw: I prefer printing on slightly stiff paper or card stock instead of regular paper.

lines.text: Attach two pieces of the game board together using double-sided tape.
lines.text_raw: Attach two pieces of the game board together using double-sided tape.

lines.text: Assemble the rest of the game board in the same way.
lines.text_raw: Assemble the rest of the game board in the same way.

lines.text: Place the printed copy of PrintVersionInside.pdf on the game board.
lines.text_raw: Place the printed copy of  '''PrintVersionInside.pdf''' on the game board.

lines.text: Then, fold the game board.
lines.text_raw: Then, fold the game board.

lines.text: Cover with paper and attach the sticker to the center of the paper.
lines.text_raw: Cover with paper and attach the sticker to the center of the paper.

lines.text: To make the game kit, first unfold the kit.
lines.text_raw: To make the game kit, first unfold the kit.

lines.text: Cut the all the sticks, racers, and racers' stands.
lines.text_raw: Cut the all the sticks, racers, and racers' stands.

lines.text: To make the sticks, fold the each part.
lines.text_raw: To make the sticks, fold the each part.

lines.text: Attach the long side of the stick using double sided tape.
lines.text_raw: Attach the long side of the stick using double sided tape.

lines.text: Put glue on the tip of the stick.
lines.text_raw: Put glue on the tip of the stick.

lines.text: This part can be a bit challenging. Once you have applied the glue, put your thumb on the end of the stick and push it in as shown.
lines.text_raw: This part can be a bit challenging. Once you have applied the glue, put your thumb on the end of the stick and push it in as shown.

lines.text: You can also carefully hit the tip of the stick on the table to push the end in.
lines.text_raw: You can also carefully hit the tip of the stick on the table to push the end in.

lines.text: Fold a racer in half.
lines.text_raw: Fold a racer in half.

lines.text: Fold a racer's stand as shown.
lines.text_raw: Fold a racer's stand as shown.

lines.text: Cut a small slit in the middle of the stand.
lines.text_raw: Cut a small slit in the middle of the stand.

lines.text: Insert the racer in the middle of the stand.
lines.text_raw: Insert the racer in the middle of the stand.

lines.text: You're done. Now, the game is ready to play.
lines.text_raw: You're done. Now, the game is ready to play.

lines.text: Instructions for playing this game are included in PrintVersionInside.pdf.
lines.text_raw: Instructions for playing this game are included in '''PrintVersionInside.pdf'''.

lines.text: Enjoy the game!
lines.text_raw: Enjoy the game!

guide.summary: This is a paper version of the Yut-no-ri game kit. You can make your own board game or you can make this kit version as a gift for your friends.
guide.title: Korean Board Game, 'Yut-no-ri'
